instructions: If you can t see your screen, wake up the watch. To open your list of apps, press the Power button. Tap Settings and then System . Tap About and then Versions . Your watch has an OS version and a system version. To find both pieces of info: OS version : Look under "Wear OS by Google" or "Android OS." Learn how to update your watch's OS . System version : Look under "System version." Learn how to update your watch's system .
